parameters.name: NumCenterLine
parameters.description: Total number of centerlines on this drawing view

title: IView.IGetCenterLines
description: Gets all of the centerlines on this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumCenterLine
parameters.description: Total number of centerlines on this drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of centerlines VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of centerlines all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstCenterLine
and then repeatedly calling
ICenterLine::GetNext
to obtain the remaining centerlines on the drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetCenterLineCount
to get the value for numCenterLine.
